item.title: Prosus 注销其持有的印度 Byju's 公司 9.6% 的股份
item.description: 科技投资商 Prosus NV 表示，它已在 2024 财年注销了其在印度教育科技公司 Byju's 所持 9.6% 股份的公允价值，这使这家荷兰公司成为首家完全注销其在这家陷入困境的初创公司投资的公司。【原文：Tech investor Prosus NV said it has written off the fair value of its 9.6% stake in Indian edtech firm Byju's during the financial year 2024, making the Dutch firm the first to fully write-off its investment in the troubled startup.】

item.title: 欧盟监管机构称苹果应用商店规则违反欧盟技术规则
item.description: 欧盟反垄断监管机构周一表示，苹果公司的应用程序商店规则违反了欧盟的技术规则，因为这些规则阻止了应用程序开发商引导消费者选择其他产品，这一指控可能导致这家 iPhone 制造商被处以巨额罚款。【原文：Apple's App Store rules breach EU tech rules because they prevent app developers from steering consumers to alternative offers, EU antitrust regulators said on Monday, a charge that could result in a hefty fine for the iPhone maker.】

item.title: 布雷顿：欧盟将就数字市场规则对苹果采取进一步行动
item.description: 欧盟专员蒂埃里-布雷顿（Thierry Breton）在 X 网站上发表文章称，欧盟将于周一对苹果公司采取进一步行动，涉及该公司遵守被称为《数字市场法》（Digital Markets Act）的技术法规的情况。【原文：The EU will take further action against Apple on Monday linked to the company's compliance to tech regulation known as the Digital Markets Act, Commissioner Thierry Breton said in a post on X.】

item.title: 百事可乐放弃瓶装饮料交易条款，嘉士伯欲以 39 亿美元竞购 Britvic
item.description: 嘉士伯周一表示，百事公司已同意放弃与 Britvic 签订的装瓶协议中的控制权变更条款，这可能会消除丹麦啤酒商竞购这家英国公司的障碍。【原文：Carlsberg said on Monday PepsiCo has agreed to waive a change of control clause in its bottling arrangements with Britvic , potentially removing a hurdle from the Danish brewer's path to bid for the British company.】

item.title: 市场：法国债券守夜人给美国的启示
item.description: 债券守夜人对挥霍无度的法国政客的激烈反应是对美国的一个重要提醒：市场很可能会决定债务可持续性的临界点，而且很难预测。【原文：Bond vigilantes' violent reaction to spendthrift French politicians is an important reminder for the United States: the market will likely determine the tipping point for debt sustainability, and it will be hard to predict it.】

item.title: 欧洲 警惕日元干预和美国通胀
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 日本下令改善 MUFG 银行的合规性，并与摩根士丹利建立证券合作关系
item.description: 日本银行业监管机构发现三菱日联金融集团（MUFG）的银行和证券部门多次违反 "防火墙 "规定，该机构周一下令三菱日联金融集团改进合规措施。【原文：Japan's banking regulator on Monday ordered the banking and securities units of Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group (MUFG) to improve compliance measures after the securities watchdog found multiple breaches of "firewall" regulations.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，中国字节跳动与博通合作开发先进的人工智能芯片
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士称，中国的字节跳动公司正在与美国芯片设计公司博通公司合作开发一种先进的人工智能处理器，此举将有助于TikTok的所有者在中美关系紧张之际确保高端芯片的充足供应。【原文：China's ByteDance is working with U.S. chip designer Broadcom on developing an advanced AI processor, two sources familiar with the matter said, a move that would help TikTok's owner secure sufficient supply of high-end chips amid U.S.-Sino tensions.】

item.title: 日本警告外汇市场不要快速波动，重申随时准备采取行动
item.description: 东京最高货币外交官神田正人（Masato Kanda）周一表示，日本随时准备对市场的过度波动采取行动，因为日元兑美元汇率跌至160附近，引发了市场对新干预前景的谨慎情绪。【原文：Japan is always ready to take action against excessive market moves, Tokyo's top currency diplomat Masato Kanda said on Monday, as the yen fell close to 160 to the dollar, raising market caution about the prospect of fresh intervention.】

item.title: 中国国家媒体报道：中国希望欧盟在 7 月 4 日前取消电动汽车关税
item.description: 据中国国家控制的《环球时报》报道，在双方同意举行新的贸易谈判后，中国政府希望欧盟在 7 月 4 日前取消对中国电动汽车征收的初步关税。【原文：Beijing wants the European Union to scrap its preliminary tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles by July 4, China's state-controlled Global Times reported, after an agreement by both sides to hold new trade talks.】

item.title: 中国凯撒集团清算申请被香港法院延期审理
item.description: 香港一家法院周一将凯撒集团（Kaisa Group）申请清盘的听证会延期至 8 月 12 日，使这家陷入困境的中国开发商在制定债务重组计划时得到一些喘息机会。【原文：A Hong Kong court on Monday adjourned a hearing into a petition seeking liquidation of Kaisa Group until Aug. 12, giving the embattled Chinese developer some respite as it works on its debt restructuring plan.】

item.title: 摘要显示，日本央行在 6 月会议上讨论了及时加息的必要性
item.description: 周一的会议摘要显示，日本央行在 6 月份就近期加息的可能性进行了辩论，一位决策者呼吁立即加息，以应对通胀超出预期的风险。【原文：The Bank of Japan debated in June the chance of a near-term interest rate hike with one policymaker calling for an increase without delay to address risks of inflation overshooting expectations, a meeting summary showed on Monday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚将强制执行超市行业准则，违反者将被处以巨额罚款
item.description: 澳大利亚联邦政府周一表示，将对未能遵守行业行为准则的大型连锁超市处以十亿澳元的罚款，以消除人们对供应商在定价方面受到不公平压榨的担忧。【原文：Australia could impose billion dollar fines on big supermarket chains that fail to comply with an industry code of conduct, the federal government said on Monday as it seeks to address concerns that suppliers have been unfairly squeezed on pricing.】

item.title: 美元在通胀数据公布前持稳；日元向 160 点徘徊
item.description: 美元周一持稳，因为交易员们期待着美国通胀路径的新线索，这可能会影响利率，而日本当局的谈话几乎没有缓和日元跌回160整数位的趋势。【原文：The dollar was steady on Monday as traders looked ahead to fresh clues on the U.S. inflation path that will likely influence interest rates, while talk from Japanese authorities did little to temper the yen's decline back the round number of 160.】

item.title: 越南一些咖啡农场在干旱中茁壮成长，但可能无法阻止浓缩咖啡价格上涨
item.description: 越南咖啡种植者今年遭受了近十年来最严重的旱灾，这引发了人们对全球咖啡价格上涨的担忧，尽管一些咖啡种植者采取了巧妙的应对措施，保持了咖啡的健康产量。【原文：Vietnamese coffee growers have been hit hard this year by the worst drought in nearly a decade, raising concerns of pricier espressos across the world, even as some farmers keep yields healthy with clever countermeasures.】

item.title: 美元走强拖累商品市场，石油跌幅扩大
item.description: 周一亚市早盘，油价连续第二个交易日下跌，受美元走强拖累，此前市场再次出现加息换长期利率的担忧，令投资者的风险偏好降温。【原文：Oil prices fell in early Asian trade on Monday for a second straight session, weighed down by a stronger dollar after concerns of higher-for-longer interest rates resurfaced and cooled investors' risk appetite.】

item.title: 通胀和政治阴影笼罩亚洲股市
item.description: 周一，在投资者希望美国物价数据将显示通胀再度放缓的倒计时之际，亚洲股市低迷不振，而市场则对日本可能进行干预保持警惕，因为美元试探了160日元关口。【原文：Asia shares were subdued on Monday in a countdown for U.S. price data that investors hope will show a renewed moderation in inflation, while markets were on alert for possible Japanese intervention as the dollar tested the 160 yen barrier.】

item.title: 早间竞价：日元交易员关注日本央行会议纪要，中国关注经济反弹
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 独家报道：最后期限临近，美国检察官建议司法部对波音公司提出刑事指控
item.description: 两位熟悉此事的人士告诉路透社，美国检察官发现波音公司违反了与两起致命空难有关的和解协议，因此建议司法部高级官员对波音公司提起刑事指控。【原文：U.S. prosecutors are recommending to senior Justice Department officials that criminal charges be brought against Boeing after finding the planemaker violated a settlement related to two fatal crashes, two people familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: UPS 宣布以 10 亿美元向 RXO 出售 Coyote 物流部门
item.description: 全球最大的包裹递送公司联合包裹服务公司（United Parcel Service）周日表示，将以 10.25 亿美元的价格将其 Coyote Logistics 业务部门出售给 RXO。【原文：United Parcel Service , the world' biggest parcel delivery firm, on Sunday said it would sell its Coyote Logistics business unit to RXO for $1.025 billion.】

item.title: 保诚计划回购 20 亿美元股票
item.description: 保险集团保诚（Prudential）周日在一份声明中表示，该公司计划实施一项价值 20 亿美元的股票回购计划，最迟将于 2026 年年中完成。【原文：Insurance group Prudential plans a $2 billion share buyback programme which will be completed no later than mid-2026, the company said in a statement on Sunday.】

item.title: Ooredoo 首席执行官称，在美国限制向中东地区出口人工智能之际，英伟达将在中东推出人工智能产品
item.description: Ooredoo 首席执行官告诉路透社，Nvidia 已签署协议，将在卡塔尔电信集团 Ooredoo 在五个中东国家拥有的数据中心部署其人工智能技术。【原文：Nvidia has signed a deal to deploy its artificial intelligence technology at data centres owned by Qatari telecoms group Ooredoo in five Middle Eastern countries, Ooredoo's CEO told Reuters.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，苹果和 Meta 讨论了人工智能合作事宜
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周日报道，Facebook 母公司 Meta Platforms 已经讨论过将 Meta 的生成式人工智能模型整合到苹果公司最近发布的 iPhone 人工智能系统中。【原文：Facebook parent Meta Platforms has discussed integrating Meta's generative AI model into Apple Inc's recently announced AI system for iPhones, the Wall Street Journal reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》称，在马斯克施加成本压力的情况下，雅卡里诺对 X 公司进行了调整
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周日称，社交媒体平台 X 的首席执行官琳达-雅卡里诺（Linda Yaccarino）面对公司所有者埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）要求提高销售额和削减成本的压力，已经调整了她的内部圈子。【原文：The chief executive of social media platform X, Linda Yaccarino, has shaken up her inner circle in the face of pressure from owner Elon Musk to boost sales and cut costs, the Financial Times said on Sunday.】

item.title: 通货膨胀加剧，爱吃肉的阿根廷人牛肉吃得少了
item.description: 阿根廷人以牛排馆、广阔的牧场和烤肉而闻名，但由于三位数的通货膨胀和经济衰退，他们不得不勒紧裤腰带，牛肉的消费量比以往任何时候都要少。【原文：Argentines, famed for steakhouses, sprawling cattle ranches and asado barbecues, are consuming less beef than ever, forced to tighten their belts by triple-digit inflation and a recession.】

item.title: 阿拉斯加航空公司与空乘人员达成临时协议
item.description: 代表阿拉斯加航空公司空乘人员的工会周五表示，他们已与该航空公司就一份创纪录的合同达成了临时协议。【原文：A union representing flight attendants for Alaska Airlines said on Friday that they have reached a tentative agreement for a record contract with the carrier.】

item.title: Under Armour 将支付 4.34 亿美元了结 2017 年诉讼案
item.description: Under Armour 周五表示，将与 2017 年的一起股东集体诉讼达成和解，该诉讼指控这家服装制造商和首席执行官凯文-普兰克（Kevin Plank）在公司财务健康状况方面故意误导股东。【原文：Under Armour said on Friday it would settle a 2017 shareholder class action lawsuit that accused the apparel maker and CEO Kevin Plank of intentionally misleading them about the company's financial health.】

item.title: 美国财政部从航空公司权证拍卖中获得 5.567 亿美元收入
item.description: 美国财政部周五表示，通过拍卖美国 11 家主要航空公司的认股权证，政府获得了 5.567 亿美元的收益，以换取 COVID-19 援助。【原文：The U.S. Treasury Department said on Friday it received $556.7 million in proceeds from auctions to sell warrants in 11 major U.S. airlines the government received in exchange for COVID-19 assistance.】

item.title: VanEck 为拟议的现货以太坊 ETF 设定 0.20% 的费用
item.description: 根据美国证券交易委员会周五提交的一份文件，投资管理公司 VanEck 计划对其拟议的现货以太坊交易所交易基金收取 0.20% 的费用。【原文：Investment management firm VanEck plans to charge a fee of 0.20% on its proposed spot ethereum exchange-traded fund, according to a U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission filing on Friday.】

item.title: Sonic Automotive 称 CDK 的网络中断影响了其经销商管理系统
item.description: 汽车零售商 Sonic Automotive 周五表示，正在发生的 CDK 网络故障影响了其经销商管理系统。【原文：Auto retailer Sonic Automotive said on Friday that the ongoing CDK cyber outage had impacted its dealer management systems.】
